title: Strengthening Practical Instructional Design Competencies: Analyzing Factors Influencing Online Learning Outcomes—A Meta-Analysis-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Explain the step-by-step procedures for meta-analysis research design
Systematically classify nine core variables influencing online learning outcomes
Interpret research trend visualization results using VOSviewer
Derive meta-analysis results related to online learning using Stata software
Propose practical improvement strategies for instructional design based on analysis results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
